title: SHM - time block returns to rest

content.question: A block is attached to a horizontal spring. The block is held so the spring is stretched and the block is released from rest, undergoing simple harmonic motion with a frequency of <math alttext="2 hertz" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>Hz</mi></math>. How long after release will the block first reach a point where it is momentarilly at rest?

choices.label: <math alttext="0.25 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.25</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>
<math alttext="0.50 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.50</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>
<math alttext="1.0 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>
<math alttext="2.0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="0.25 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.25</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>
